## What is a raised bed?

![](figures/IMG_20190610_205454528.jpg){.absolute right=0 bottom=0 width="70%"}

Any soil raised up

- Nothing
- Stone
- Wood (type)
- Metal
- Recycled material



## Why?

- Attractive
- Logistics  
  (bending, weed control)
- Early warming
- Better control of soil
  - Organics
  - Fertilizer
  - Drainage
- Less compaction


![](figures/IMG-20190826-WA0001.jpg){.absolute right=0 bottom=0 width="70%"}
